main event: A reddish-bright colored object, about 60 feet in diameter, was reported flying over Hackettstown, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object was described as having the size of a basketball and emitted a sound similar to a small plane., The object was observed hovering initially before moving in an erratic manner., Witnesses stated that the object made no noise as it passed overhead., Descriptions indicated that the object had a bluish halo around it., The Air Force was unable to positively identify the object despite the investigation.
sighted object: a reddish-bright object approximately 60 feet in diameter
witness description: Witness observed the object from outside, describing it as glowing and moving at very high speeds.
